title: Fresh Mart - Avenida Ashford
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Puerto Rican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The grocery store on the lower level is like a mini Whole Foods. Upstairs is a casual deli serving breakfast as well as takeaway deli style foods with vegan choices. Deli closes earlier than the store and sometimes is out of food after 5pm.
